source_sentence: 饙(甫云切)　剗(楚簡切)　嚲(丁可切)　愜(起頰切)　蟭螟(上子饒切下亡丁切)　睫(式涉切)　喋(丈甲切)　毬(巨六切)　搊(楚尤切)　趂(丑刃切)　謴(古困切)　咳(苦代切)　攫(居縛切)　挈(尼牙切)　毿(先含切)　颯(思合切)　屙(烏何切)　[日*良](力黨切)　聻(尼止切)　晷(居美切)　藞苴(上力瓦切下七閭切)　懡[怡-台+羅](上亡果切下來可切)
translation: Steam (Fuunche), Passageway (Chujianche), Let (Dingkeche), Clam (Qijiangche), Antarctic (Shangzi raoche, Xiaowu dingche), Eyelashes (Shishuche), Chattering (Zhujiache), Knot (Juoliuche), Pluck (Chuyuche), Eka (Uobenche), Shai (Guhuche), Cough (Kandaiche), Seize (Jiuqieche), Kichao (Niyache), Tean (Xianhanche), Saṃ (Siheche), Defecate (Wuheche), [Ri*liang] (Lipanche), Chee (Nizhangche), Sundial (Jumeiche), Vatso (Shang Liwache, Xiaqiluche), Hon [Yi-tai+luo] (Shangwugoche, Xia Keqie).
